statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ -13 \\ 10 \\ -21 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
